variables I care about
```{r}
DFW <- DFW[!is.na(DFW$Grade_Group),]
DFW$DFW<-ifelse(DFW$Grade_Group=="A",0,ifelse(DFW$Grade_Group=="B",0,ifelse(DFW$Grade_Group=="C",0,ifelse(DFW$Grade_Group=="D",0,1))))
DFW$DDFW<-ifelse(DFW$Grade_Group=="A",0,ifelse(DFW$Grade_Group=="B",0,ifelse(DFW$Grade_Group=="C",0,1)))
names(DFW)[names(DFW)=="INSTRUCTOR1_NAME"] <- "instructor"
names(DFW)[names(DFW)=="FirstGeneration"] <- "firstgen"
names(DFW)[names(DFW)=="COURSE_ID"] <- "course"
DFW$courseID <- paste(DFW$Subject,DFW$COURSE_ID,DFW$Section,DFW$TERM, sep='')
```

creating dummy variables
```{r}

DFW$firstgend <- ifelse(DFW$firstgen=="First Generation Student",1,0)

DFW$white <- ifelse(DFW$Ethnicity=="White",1,0)
DFW$black <- ifelse(DFW$Ethnicity=="Black/African American",1,0)
DFW$unknown <- ifelse(DFW$Ethnicity=="Unknown",1,ifelse(DFW$Ethnicity=="NULL",1,0))
DFW$asian <- ifelse(DFW$Ethnicity=="Asian",1,0)
DFW$mult_race <- ifelse(DFW$Ethnicity=="Two or More Races",1,0)
DFW$nonres <- ifelse(DFW$Ethnicity=="Non-Resident Alien",1,0)
DFW$pac_isl <- ifelse(DFW$Ethnicity=="Pacific Islander",1,0)
DFW$indian <- ifelse(DFW$Ethnicity=="American Indian/Alaskan Native",1,0)

DFW$Female <- ifelse(DFW$GenderLabel=="Male",0,1)

```

subset data
```{r}
DFW_phys <- DFW[DFW$Subject=="PHYS",]
DFW_math <- DFW[DFW$Subject=="MATH",]
DFW_math_phys <- DFW[DFW$Subject=="PHYS" | DFW$Subject=="MATH",]
```

Models
```{r}
m1 <- (DFW ~ 1)
m1.5 <- (DFW ~ LA)
m2 <- (DFW ~ white)
m3 <- (DFW ~ white + firstgend)
m4 <- (DFW ~ white + firstgend + Female)
m5 <- (DFW ~ white + firstgend + Female + LA)
m6 <- (DFW ~ white*LA + firstgend*LA +Female*LA)

m1d <- (DDFW ~ 1)
m1.5d <- (DDFW ~ LA)
m2d <- (DDFW ~ white)
m3d <- (DDFW ~ white + firstgend)
m4d <- (DDFW ~ white + firstgend + Female)
m5d <- (DDFW ~ white + firstgend + Female + LA)
m6d <- (DDFW ~ white*LA + firstgend*LA +Female*LA)
```

running models - physics
```{r}
p1 <- hglm(fixed = m1, random = ~ 1|courseID, data=DFW_phys, family = binomial(link = logit), calc.like=TRUE)
p1.5 <- hglm(fixed = m1.5, random = ~ 1|courseID, data=DFW_phys, family = binomial(link = logit), calc.like=TRUE)
p2 <- hglm(fixed = m2, random = ~ 1|courseID, data=DFW_phys, family = binomial(link = logit), calc.like=TRUE)
p3 <- hglm(fixed = m3, random = ~ 1|courseID, data=DFW_phys, family = binomial(link = logit), calc.like=TRUE)
p4 <- hglm(fixed = m4, random = ~ 1|courseID, data=DFW_phys, family = binomial(link = logit), calc.like=TRUE)
p5 <- hglm(fixed = m5, random = ~ 1|courseID, data=DFW_phys, family = binomial(link = logit), calc.like=TRUE)
p6 <- hglm(fixed = m6, random = ~ 1|courseID, data=DFW_phys, family = binomial(link = logit), calc.like=TRUE)

p1d <- hglm(fixed = m1d, random = ~ 1|courseID, data=DFW_phys, family = binomial(link = logit), calc.like=TRUE)
p1.5d <- hglm(fixed = m1.5d, random = ~ 1|courseID, data=DFW_phys, family = binomial(link = logit), calc.like=TRUE)
p2d <- hglm(fixed = m2d, random = ~ 1|courseID, data=DFW_phys, family = binomial(link = logit), calc.like=TRUE)
p3d <- hglm(fixed = m3d, random = ~ 1|courseID, data=DFW_phys, family = binomial(link = logit), calc.like=TRUE)
p4d <- hglm(fixed = m4d, random = ~ 1|courseID, data=DFW_phys, family = binomial(link = logit), calc.like=TRUE)
p5d <- hglm(fixed = m5d, random = ~ 1|courseID, data=DFW_phys, family = binomial(link = logit), calc.like=TRUE)
p6d <- hglm(fixed = m6d, random = ~ 1|courseID, data=DFW_phys, family = binomial(link = logit), calc.like=TRUE)
```

Probabilities - physics (https://sebastiansauer.github.io/convert_logit2prob/)
```{r}
logit2prob <- function(logit){
  odds <- exp(logit)
  prob <- odds / (1 + odds)
  return(prob)
}

logit2prob(-0.8974)
logit2prob(-1.5)
mean(DFW_phys$DDFW)
```

cAIC - physics
```{r}
cAIC(p1)
```

mp1 <- hglm(fixed = m1, random = ~ 1|courseID, data=DFW_math_phys, family = binomial(link = logit))
